main event: A UFO sighting occurred near Hyattsville, Maryland on 12th June 1954, lasting for approximately 45 minutes. The observation was of a single unidentified object traveling in a straight course, resembling characteristics of astronomical sightings such as stars or planets.
interesting points: The report indicates that the sighting was characteristic of astro sightings, with only the elevation reported and no estimation provided, leading to the conclusion that it was probably an astro body like a star or planet.
Despite the presence of numerous civilian and military aircraft around the Washington area, no clear analysis could be based on the sighting at the time of the report.
The unidentified object observed was described as a large light, oval or round in shape, with bluish-green color, and circling and hovering in relation to nearby trees.
The sighting lasted for approximately 45 minutes, and the observation was made from the ground visual perspective. No photographs were taken during the observation.
No conclusive explanation or analysis could be derived from the report, leaving the sighting unexplained and open to further investigation.
